languages.text: "По крайней мере тебе ведомо некое подобие благодарности, ксенос. Вольный Торговец — единственная причина, почему ты все еще жива. Справедливо воздать {mf|ему|ей} по заслугам".
"At least you know some semblance of gratitude, xenos. The Rogue Trader is the only reason you are still alive. It is only just that you repay {mf|him|her}."
languages.original_text: "По крайней мере тебе ведомо некое подобие благодарности, ксенос. Вольный Торговец — единственная причина, почему ты все еще жива. Справедливо воздать {mf|ему|ей} по заслугам".

traits.locale_text: "At least you know some semblance of gratitude, xenos. The Rogue Trader is the only reason you are still alive. It is only just that you repay {mf|him|her}."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "At least you know some semblance of gratitude, xenos. The Rogue Trader is the only reason you are still alive. It is only just that you repay {mf|him|her}."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "At least you know some semblance of gratitude, xenos. The Rogue Trader is the only reason you are still alive. It is only just that you repay {mf|him|her}."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: “你至少还知道做些表面的答谢工夫，异形。正是因为行商浪人，你才能活着，因此你确实应该报答{mf|他|她}。”
languages.original_text: "At least you know some semblance of gratitude, xenos. The Rogue Trader is the only reason you are still alive. It is only just that you repay {mf|him|her}."

traits.locale_text: “你至少还知道做些表面的答谢工夫，异形。正是因为行商浪人，你才能活着，因此你确实应该报答{mf|他|她}。”
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: « Vous êtes donc capable d'avoir un semblant de gratitude, xénos ? Il est vrai que si vous êtes encore en vie, c'est uniquement grâce {mf|au libre-marchand|à la libre-marchande}. Ce n'est que justice que vous vous dédiez corps et âme à son service. »
languages.original_text: "At least you know some semblance of gratitude, xenos. The Rogue Trader is the only reason you are still alive. It is only just that you repay {mf|him|her}."

traits.locale_text: « Vous êtes donc capable d'avoir un semblant de gratitude, xénos ? Il est vrai que si vous êtes encore en vie, c'est uniquement grâce {mf|au libre-marchand|à la libre-marchande}. Ce n'est que justice que vous vous dédiez corps et âme à son service. »
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: «Por lo menos comprendes el concepto de gratitud, xenos. Si sigues viva, es por {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente, así que qué menos que recompensar sus esfuerzos».
languages.original_text: "At least you know some semblance of gratitude, xenos. The Rogue Trader is the only reason you are still alive. It is only just that you repay {mf|him|her}."

traits.locale_text: «Por lo menos comprendes el concepto de gratitud, xenos. Si sigues viva, es por {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente, así que qué menos que recompensar sus esfuerzos».
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: 「一応、うわべだけの感謝ができるのだな、異種族。自由開拓者がお前を生かしている理由はただひとつ。かろうじて役に立つからというだけだ」
languages.original_text: "At least you know some semblance of gratitude, xenos. The Rogue Trader is the only reason you are still alive. It is only just that you repay {mf|him|her}."

traits.locale_text: 「一応、うわべだけの感謝ができるのだな、異種族。自由開拓者がお前を生かしている理由はただひとつ。かろうじて役に立つからというだけだ」
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Zumindest kennt Ihr etwas Ähnliches wie Dankbarkeit, Xenos. {mf|Der Freihändler|Die Freihändlerin} ist der einzige Grund, warum Ihr noch lebt. Es ist nur recht, dass Ihr Eure Schuld bei {mf|ihm|ihr} begleicht."
languages.original_text: "At least you know some semblance of gratitude, xenos. The Rogue Trader is the only reason you are still alive. It is only just that you repay {mf|him|her}."

traits.locale_text: "Zumindest kennt Ihr etwas Ähnliches wie Dankbarkeit, Xenos. {mf|Der Freihändler|Die Freihändlerin} ist der einzige Grund, warum Ihr noch lebt. Es ist nur recht, dass Ihr Eure Schuld bei {mf|ihm|ihr} begleicht."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.original_text: "At least you know some semblance of gratitude, xenos. The Rogue Trader is the only reason you are still alive. It is only just that you repay {mf|him|her}."

languages.text: "En azından minnettarlık nedir biliyorsun zeno. Hür Tacir, nefes alabiliyor olmanın tek sebebi. Yapman gereken şey, ona borcunu ödemek."
languages.original_text: "At least you know some semblance of gratitude, xenos. The Rogue Trader is the only reason you are still alive. It is only just that you repay {mf|him|her}."
